templates.title: Reduce Cart Abandonment – Next purchase Discount
Reduce Cart Abandonment Exit Intent Popup
External Link Notice Slide with URL

fields.template-custom-js:
<script>
    EngageBox.onReady(function() {
        const box = document.querySelector(".eb-inst").engagebox;
        box.on("beforeOpen", function() {
            box.el.querySelectorAll(".eb-site").forEach(element => {
                element.innerHTML = "example.com";
            });
        });
    });
</script>
